named-query.name: findRequirementByIds
named-query.query: SELECT r FROM Requirement r WHERE r.id in :ids

named-query.name: findRequirementByIds.count
named-query.query: SELECT count(r) FROM Requirement r WHERE r.id in :ids

named-query.name: findEnabledRequirementsByStateFsn
named-query.query: SELECT r FROM Requirement r WHERE r.enabled = 1 and r.state = :state and r.fsn in :fsns

named-query.name: findEnabledRequirementsByStateFsn.count
named-query.query: SELECT count(r) FROM Requirement r WHERE r.enabled = 1 and r.state = :state and r.fsn in :fsn

named-query.name: findCurrentRequirementsByState
named-query.query: SELECT r FROM Requirement r WHERE r.current = 1 and r.state = :state

named-query.name: findCurrentRequirementsByState.count
named-query.query: SELECT count(r) FROM Requirement r WHERE r.current = 1 and r.state = :state

named-query.name: fetchBandDataForFSNs
named-query.query: SELECT fb FROM FsnBand fb WHERE fb.fsn IN :fsns and fb.timeFrame = :timeFrame

named-query.name: fetchBandDataForFSNs.count
named-query.query: SELECT count(fb) FROM FsnBand fb WHERE fb.fsn IN :fsns and fb.timeFrame = :timeFrame

named-query.name: fetchWeeklySalesForFsns
named-query.query: SELECT ws FROM WeeklySale ws WHERE ws.fsn IN :fsns

named-query.name: fetchWeeklySalesForFsns.count
named-query.query: SELECT count(ws) FROM WeeklySale ws WHERE ws.fsn IN :fsns

named-query.name: fetchLastAppSupplierForFsns
named-query.query: SELECT l FROM LastAppSupplier l WHERE l.fsn IN :fsns

named-query.name: fetchLastAppSupplierForFsns.count
named-query.query: SELECT count(l) FROM LastAppSupplier l WHERE l.fsn IN :fsns

named-query.name: IwtRequestItem.fetchByFsnsInStatuses
named-query.query: SELECT iri FROM IwtRequestItem iri WHERE iri.fsn IN :fsns AND iri.status IN :statuses

named-query.name: OpenRequirementAndPurchaseOrder.fetchByFsns
named-query.query: SELECT rpo FROM OpenRequirementAndPurchaseOrder rpo WHERE rpo.fsn IN :fsns

named-query.name: Policy.fetchByFsns
named-query.query: SELECT p FROM Policy p WHERE p.fsn IN :fsns

named-query.name: Policy.fetchByGroupIds
named-query.query: SELECT p FROM Policy p WHERE p.group.id IN :ids AND p.fsn IS NULL

named-query.name: GroupFsn.fetchByFsns
named-query.query: SELECT gf FROM GroupFsn gf WHERE gf.fsn IN :fsns
